# Weekdagmodule

In the weekdagmodule, there are options to generate shapefiles in GEOMILIEU and CIMLK formats. In these shapefiles, there are several fields. The definition of these fields are as follows:

## Fieldnames in Geomilieu Export

![](images/clipboard-3863380911.png)

## Dagdeel Calculation Periods

```r
DAY => dag = 12 uur
EVE => avond = 4 uur
NI => nacht = 8 uur

Rekenvoorbeeld
Dag LV * 12 + Avond LV * 4 + Nacht LV * 8 => LV Etmaal

```
